  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutNGBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x400

    LayoutNGBlockFlow {DIV} at (40,0) size 10000x200 [bgcolor=#FFFF00]

        text run at (1,0) width 63: "Some text"
